Package peanuty.framework.base

Interface Summary
EventLog  
PageControlInterface  
 

Class Summary
BaseBean All new application classes should extends this class
BaseDBBean Title: BaseDBBean
BaseServlet  
BaseXML  
Config Base configuration infomation class which based on the file "WEB-INF/xml/config.xml"
The file looked like this:
<config>
<context-root>/contextroot</context-root>
<requestEncoding>UTF-8</requestEncoding>
<pageman rowsPerPage="16"/>
<webserver type="tomcat" requestEncoding="UTF-8"/>
<log classname="peanuty.framework.base.log.LogSimple"/>
</config>
DBConnection  
PageControl replace of Servlet

Title:
PageControlBase PageControl Foundation Class
XMLHandler Title: XMLHandler
